I’ve been struggling to write coherent phrases lately, but I’ve got to prove I’m still living this sad life of being a part-time nhentai comment. I’ve been looking some tomgirl stuff lately, and I’ve come to the realization I’m not gay. I’m just heartbroken. There’s no room for fantasy and reality to coexist, and what’s up with people writing reviews? Sure I maybe did once or twice and haven’t deleted them (forgot where I commented) but I want comments to either being an existential crisis, some humorous shit or people accepting how low they’ve fallen. Fuck I’m starting writing prompts again.
